content:
# Factorio Agent Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Operation at position (52.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (52.0, -82.0) mining coal
  - Currently refueled with coal
- Wooden chest at position (52.5, -80.5) collecting the mined coal
  - Currently contains 10 coal

### Iron Ore Mining Operation at position (3.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (3.0, -73.0) mining iron ore
  - Currently refueled with coal
- Wooden chest at position (3.5, -71.5) collecting the mined iron ore (contains 15 iron ore)
- Transport belt at position (4.5, -71.5) connected to the mining operation

### Iron Smelting Operation at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates (has 17 coal but no ingredients)
- Stone furnace at position (3.0, 0.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates (has 8 coal but no ingredients)

### Automated Iron Plate Production at position (20.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (20.0, 0.0) for smelting iron ore (has 4 coal)
  - Currently working with 2 iron ore
- Input section:
  - Wooden chest at position (20.5, -2.5) for storing iron ore (currently contains 2 iron ore)
  - Burner inserter at position (20.5, -1.5) with pickup position (20.5, -2.5) and drop position (20.5, -0.5) (fueled with 3 coal)
- Output section:
  - Burner inserter at position (20.5, 1.5) with pickup position (20.5, 0.5) and drop position (20.5, 2.5) (fueled with 3 coal)
  - Wooden chest at position (20.5, 2.5) for collecting iron plates (currently contains 14 iron plates)

### Automated Copper Plate Production at position (30.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (30.0, 0.0) for smelting copper ore (has 5 coal)
  - Currently working with 1 copper ore
- Input section:
  - Wooden chest at position (30.5, -2.5) for storing copper ore (currently contains 2 copper ore)
  - Burner inserter at position (30.5, -1.5) with pickup position (30.5, -2.5) and drop position (30.5, -0.5) (fueled with 3 coal)
    - Currently working
- Output section:
  - Burner inserter at position (30.5, 1.5) with pickup position (30.5, 0.5) and drop position (30.5, 2.5) (fueled with 3 coal)
    - Currently working
  - Wooden chest at position (30.5, 2.5) for collecting copper plates (currently contains 18 copper plates)

### Automated Smelting System at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Input section:
  - Wooden chest at position (0.5, 4.5) storing iron ore (currently empty)
  - Burner inserter at position (0.5, 2.5) with pickup position (0.5, 3.5) and drop position (0.5, 1.5) (fueled with 1 coal)
- Output section:
  - Burner inserter at position (0.5, -1.5) with pickup position (0.5, -2.5) and drop position (0.5, -0.5) (fueled with 1 coal)
  - Wooden chest at position (0.5, -3.5) for collecting processed plates (currently empty)

### Electronic
